#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
char c[100009], tmp;
int main(){
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    ll t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        ll n;
        cin>>n;
        ll a[n];
        ll sum = 0;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            cin>>a[i];
            sum += a[i];
        }
        ll found = -1;
        for(int i=0; i<150; i++){
            int j = i+n;
            ll ss = 0;
            for(int k=i; k<j; k++){
                ss += k;
            }
            if(ss==sum) found = i;
        }
        if(found==-1)cout<<found<<endl;
        else{
            ll ans = 0;
            for(int i=0 ;i<n;i++,found++){
                if(found-a[i]>0) ans+= found-a[i];
            }
            cout<<ans<<endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
